code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{set}from'../redux/product-modal/productModalSlice';import Button from'./Button';import numberWithCommas from'../utils/numberWithCommas';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var ProductCard=function ProductCard(props){var dispatch=useDispatch();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/catalog/".concat(props.slug),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-card__image",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:props.img01,alt:""}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:props.img02,alt:""})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"product-card__name",children:props.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-card__price",children:[numberWithCommas(props.price),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"product-card__price__old",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("del",{children:numberWithCommas(35000)})})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"product-card__btn",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{size:"sm",icon:"bx bx-cart",animate:true,onClick:function onClick(){return dispatch(set(props.slug));},children:"Add to Cart"})})]});};export default ProductCard;
